Package com.lg1_1.cyroam.volley

Class progressVolley

java.lang.Object
com.lg1_1.cyroam.volley.progressVolley
public class progressVolley extends Object
Handles volley requests specifically for pin data.

  • Method Details

    • discoverPin

      public void discoverPin(int userId, int pinId, progressVolley.VolleyCallback callback)
      this function creates a new progress object which logs discovery of a pin for a given player. Uses volley to store that information in the database
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID of the player
      pinId - the pin ID of the pin they are discovering
      callback - callback that handles errors and passes information

    • fetchProgress

      public void fetchProgress(int progressId, progressVolley.VolleyCallbackGet callback)
      Deprecated.
      because we've moved away from individual progress objects for each user and pin.
      Parameters:
      progressId - the ID of the progress object stored in the server.
      callback - handles errors and passes information
